description: Measures designed to contain the coronavirus pandemic will change how millions of people celebrate.
title: Coronavirus: How Europeans are preparing for Christmas and New Year
title_page: Coronavirus: How Europeans are preparing for Christmas and New Year - BBC News
maintext: "We need to bite this very sour apple before things get better. And yes they will get better. There will come a time when coronavirus will be behind us, when our lives will be normal again," he said.
